name: mu-logger
description: An asynchronous, multi-transport logger optimized for ES6+ and microservices.

scripts.setup: npm install && npm run typings && npm run build
scripts.clean: echo Cleaning up compiled files && rm -rf ./src/**/*.js && rm -rf ./test/**/*.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && echo Building TypeScript Files && tsc -p .
scripts.clean-typings: echo Cleaning up TypeScript typings && rm -rf ./typings
